title: No Fee -- A Single-Family House with 5 Bed/2 Bath and 2-Car Garage
posting_body: ['A large handsome single-family house is located in a quiet neighborhood at the Brighton Center; A great place for family or young working professionals to cherish their kinship and memories together, not to mention a much safer alternative to crowded apartment complexes!', 'Easy access to Boston College and Boston University (10 minuets walk to Chiswick Road, Green Line B branch to both BC and BU).', 'Short walks to following MBTA Bus Routes:', '65 --- to Longwood Medical Area, Fenway Park and Kenmore', '86 --- to Harvard University/Cambridge and Sullivan Square/Somerville', '501 --- to South Station and Downtown', '503 --- to Copley Square and Back Bay', 'Walking distance to Cleveland Circle and St. Elizabeth Hospital;', 'Living space is well over 2000 sq.', 'ft. High ceiling, great windows, hardwood and tile floors; Very large spaces for outdoor and indoor storage.', 'Welcoming front and back porch;', '4 bedrooms on 2nd floor and one large on 3rd floor with high privacy.', '2 spacious full bathrooms;', 'Large eat-in kitchen including dishwasher; Extra freezer for stocking up essential foods;', 'Large sunny dining room and living room perfect for family and friends;', 'Large full basement with gas furnace and washer/dryer (included in rent)', 'Detached large 2-car garage with driveway for more parking; Excellent storage space for bicycles; No extra fee for parking.', 'Pets OK with limitations; Available September 1, 2022.', 'Contact the owner at 774-270-0811 for appointment and this fantastic no fee rental!']
